amendment.description: To restore reimbursement for total body orthotic management for nonambulatory, severely disabled nursing home residents.

vote.text: Amendment SA 968 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 968 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S8290; text: CR S8290) To restore reimbursement for total body orthotic management for nonambulatory, severely disabled nursing home residents.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 968 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 968 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Harkin.
